entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • warning MA002 is raised claiming that packages are not automatically included, yet packages *are* automatically included - leading to making it impossible to add a direct reference to an implicit package through tooling #20658
  • aot-runtime.c:1579, condition `data' not met #20657
  • [iOS] Improve the CollectionView FindEstimatedSizeUsingWidth to handle grouping and testing #20654
    Backlog
  • Error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) (CS0246) #20649
  • Add more tests for Images on buttons #20648
  • Connectivity.Current.ConnectivityChanged += Connectivity_ConnectivityChanged; event is not raised #20645
  • [iOs - Publish] iOs Publishing fails with codesign execution finished (exit code = 1). #20640
  • [BUG] Windows Shell Flyout Navigation fails to navigate to same page after navigating back from it #20635
  • Warning `XC0022` if using `FormattedText` from a `Label` #20633
  • [iOS] UIScrollView Custom Handler's Zoom View changes position after resuming from OnSleep state #20632
  • [iOS] Editor does not scroll when cursor goes behind keyboard #20631

Closed

  • [Android] Modal Pages do not fill screen when in Fullscreen #10364
    Backlog
  • Support compiled bindings for generic ViewModels #20616
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Page.Width = -1 in Page_Loaded() in Mac Catalyst Maui #10763
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Text color is not set if the button has a style #20643
  • Error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) #20638
  • [Enhancement] Add different input types for prompt #9913
    Backlog
  • Touch input doesn't work in MAUI.Blazor #20377
  • ImageButton is not properly anti-aliased when scaled down #16918
    Under Consideration
  • KNOWN ISSUE: .NET SDK 8.0.200 Installs the Incorrect MAUI Workload Versions #20600
  • [Bug] Animated GIF files do not play on iOS/macOS #866
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Compile Error: "The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found" in latest nightly builds #20099
  • error CS0234: The type or namespace name 'Compatibility' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform' #20565
  • The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Maui 8.0.7 #20591
  • Error in xamarin.kotlin.stdlib ($ReflectSdkVersion is defined multiple times) after migration from Xamarin.Forms #14954
  • Hot Reload not working on Tutorial #20636

PullRequests

Created

  • Change activity attributes #20653
  • [Android Connectivity] Set app package on Intent used to invoke context receiver for network callback #20651
  • [Testing] Added categories to Controls.AppiumTests #20642
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [net9.0] Enable unit tests back #20639
  • [C] Parent Background Brush to propagate changes #20637

Merged

  • Fix modal page push in immersive mode #19903
    community ✨, area/modal
  • [net9.0] Bring latest main fixes to net9.0 #20652
  • [XC] Allow generic types in x:DataType and x:Type #20625
  • Update Issue16918.cs to latest Appium code #20650
  • [ci] Remove Agent.OSVersion from demands #20641
  • Add new Keyboards for Prompt #20194
    t/enhancement ☀️, do-not-merge, community ✨, area/keyboard
  • (Windows) ImageButton contents now explicitly stretches #17159
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-button, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add animated GIF support for Image on iOS #19411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 SR3
  • Only run delete if files exist #20617

Updated

  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, stale
  • [net8.0.] Update net8.0 with main #20563
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Updated Development guide #20543
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Create devcontainer.json #19947
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Fix page swap from background #19532
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • [Window] Fix transforms being offset by 0.5x0.5 #20454
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner
  • Ignore ScrollRectToVisible if KeyboardAutoManagerScroll is enabled in ItemsViewController #19875
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [UITest] Re-enable iOS Scrolling tests #20618
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • [main] Update to 8.0.200 sdk and stable iOS and Android workloads #20576
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Figure a better EstimatedItemSize for HorizontalList #20022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Stand up UI testing on iOS platforms #20541
    area/testing
  • [XC] Compile bindings with Source #20610
    area/Xaml </>
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
